mapper.select: SELECT m.*, IFNULL(AVG(r.r_rating), 0) AS average_score FROM movie m LEFT JOIN review r ON m.m_id = r.m_id WHERE m.m_id = #{mId} GROUP BY m.m_id

SELECT * FROM movie
WHERE m_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{mTitle}, '%')
ORDER BY m_release DESC

SELECT * FROM movie
WHERE m_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%')
ORDER BY m_release DESC
SELECT m.* FROM movie m JOIN review r ON m.m_id = r.m_id GROUP BY m.m_id ORDER BY COUNT(r.r_id) DESC, AVG(r.r_rating) DESC
SELECT * FROM movie WHERE m_category = #{category} ORDER BY m_release DESC
SELECT m.* FROM movie m JOIN mov_act ma ON m.m_id = ma.m_id JOIN actor a ON ma.a_id = a.a_id WHERE a.a_name = #{actorName} ORDER BY m.m_release DESC
SELECT * FROM movie WHERE m_release > CURDATE() ORDER BY m_release ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movie (m_id, m_title, m_subtitle, m_release, m_showtime, m_plot, m_category, m_screening_type, m_movie_theater, m_url_image, m_url_movie, id, m_added_date) VALUES (#{mId}, #{mTitle}, #{mSubtitle}, #{mRelease}, #{mShowtime}, #{mPlot}, #{mCategory}, #{mScreeningType}, #{mMovieTheater}, #{mUrlImage}, #{mUrlMovie}, #{id}, CURDATE())
mapper.update: UPDATE movie SET m_title = #{mTitle}, m_release = #{mRelease}, m_plot = #{mPlot}, m_category = #{mCategory} WHERE m_id = #{mId}
